snippet: The high season for tourism is starting in Southeast Asia. To give -- or not to give -- small handouts to the children begging on the street? Child-welfare advocates in the region say no. Definitely no. And they explain why.
abstract: The high season for tourism is starting in Southeast Asia. To give -- or not to give -- small handouts to the children begging on the street? Child-welfare advocates in the region say no. Definitely no. And they explain why.

headline.main: Don't Give That Child a Dollar
